name: Broken Bromises
description:
TRIGGER WARNING - Story might be too relatable to your life, proceed with caution

A click-and-play story about loss, betrayal, boundaries and prejudice. 

Play the new game by world-class developers Taleb Alrefai and Hussain Alsaffar, along with their mental supporter and compatriot developer Cyberistic, and engage yourself in a hollywood Hawalli level script and AAA studio-level visuals, with a story sure to make you both cry and laugh.

Broken Bromises is sure to make everyone who plays it a fan.

Controls (Make sure to memorize before playing, keybinding options TBA):

Mouse - Navigation

We thank you in advance for all the steam award nominations.
